Plot: A recent college graduate flees to Paris after a break-up, where his involvement with a prostitute begins to reveal a potentially dark recent past.
Title: Simon Killer
Writer: Antonio Campos, Antonio Campos (story), Brady Corbet (story), Mati Diop (story)
Actors: Brady Corbet, Nicolas Ronchi, Constance Rousseau, Lila Salet
tomatoConsensus: Though its bleak themes may be off-putting for some, Simon Killer is an engrossing, effective character study of a brutal, enigmatic figure.
